.. py:class:: PredMethodClass(*args, **kwargs)

   Bases: :py:obj:`telegraph.methods._methods.MethodClass`


   Helper class that provides a standard way to create an ABC using
   inheritance.


   .. py:attribute:: ins
      :value: ['T', 'X_from']



   .. py:attribute:: outs
      :value: ['X_to_pred']



   .. py:method:: run(input_dict: Dict[str, Any], *args, **kwargs) -> Dict[str, Any]
      :classmethod:

      :abstractmethod:

   .. py:attribute:: version

      :value: ['X_to_pred']
